transportAdvice: New York has an extensive subway and bus network that runs 24 hours and covers virtually all tourist areas, making it one of the most transit-friendly cities in the world. Taxis and for-hire vehicles are widely available, and many neighborhoods are highly walkable.

weather.description: Cold winter month with occasional snow and freezing temperatures, requiring warm layers.
Still cold and wintry with possible snowfall, though days gradually grow slightly longer.
Early spring brings variable weather with cool temperatures and occasional rain showers.
Mild and pleasant spring weather with blooming trees, though rain is common.
Warm and comfortable with longer days, one of the most enjoyable months to visit.
Warm to hot with increasing humidity and occasional afternoon thunderstorms.
Hot and humid, the warmest month of the year with frequent heat and thunderstorms.
Remains hot and humid with conditions similar to July, afternoon storms are common.
Warm and pleasant early autumn with gradually cooling temperatures and lower humidity.
Crisp and colorful fall weather, widely considered one of the best months to visit.
Cool and increasingly cold with shorter days and a mix of rain and occasional early snow.
Cold winter month with festive holiday atmosphere, possible snow and freezing temperatures.
